name: Gastino

trigger.text: Give up to 2 of your opponent's leader or characters Power -3000.

text:
[On Play] Place up to 1 of your opponent's cost 3 or lower characters to the top or bottom of their life face-up.
[Trigger] Give up to 2 of your opponent's leader or characters Power -3000.

effect.text: Place up to 1 of your opponent's cost 3 or lower characters to the top or bottom of their life face-up.
